text:
Women's Clothing and Apparel Email Lists and Mailing Lists

Women's apparel and clothing store database is a collection of the contact details of virtually all women's clothing and apparel stores (including nightwear and lingerie stores) from around the world. The marketing list covers the majority of English and non-English speaking countries, including United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Canada, parts of Europe, Middle East, South Africa, Russia and CIS and Asia. Our Women's Clothing and Apparel Email Lists and Mailing Lists cover most of women's clothing shops across all states in the USA, UK, Europe, Australia, the Middle East and Asia. Our fashion industry and Apparel Buyers Email Lists are ideal for B2B marketing. IDEAL FOR FASHION DESIGNERS. FREE LIFETIME UPDATES. DOWNLOAD.

Our Women's Clothing and Apparel B2B Database contains the following data fields:

Website
Address
Tel No
Email
Social Media Links


You will receive an Excel Worksheet file with the contact details of women's clothing and apparel businesses from all over the world.


The database currently contains 31,000+ business contact details and is being updated on a rolling basis. You will receive all the updates automatically to your member's area. Upon purchase the files along with an invoice will become available in your member's area.

Download at https://creativebeartech.com/product/womens-clothing-and-apparel-email-lists-and-mailing-lists/
name: Hans Gregson
